pkgmetadata.longdescription: An IPFS-mirrored ebuild for the UT2004 Linux dedicated server. If you're unable to download it via IPFS for whatever reason, try searching the web for the file SHA1sums: e1eda562d99e66a7e5972f05bbf0de8733bf60c9 dedicatedserver3339-bonuspack.zip a8cc33877a02a0a09c288b5fc248efde282f7bdf ut2004-lnxpatch3369-2.tar.bz2 db5cccc4b08e6314f203e8f036adf8421861c501 ut2004-v3369-3-linux-dedicated.7z
